B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
Dated this the 9" day of January, 2018
ORDER
Petitioner is the accused in CC.2210/2009 of the
Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Aluva, based on
Annexure-A1 final report in Crime No.198/2007 _ of
Thrikkakara Police Station, for the offences punishable
under Sections 285, 294(b) and 504 IPC. The allegation is
that on 08.05.2007 at 11 a.m., the petitioner was found
engaged in burning some papers inside the compound of
the institution named KBPS. When he was directed by the
de facto complainant to stop it, he questioned the authority
of the de facto complainant.

2. None of the offences is attracted in the matter.
Unnecessarily, the petitioner is being harassed, just for
wrecking vengeance. Matters being so, all further
proceedings against the petitioner in CC.2210/2009 of the

pate
ines
2018/KER/989
Crl.M.C.6418/2013
:2:
Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Aluva, based on
Annexure-A1 final report in Crime No.198/2007_ of
Thrikkakara Police Station, can be quashed.

In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further
proceedings against the petitioner in CC.2210/2009 of the
Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Aluva, based on
Annexure-A1 final report in Crime No.198/2007_ of
Thrikkakara Police Station, are quashed.

Sd/-
(B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE)
